text: 4.20 Lo 12.5, 12.11-14, 1 Kin 9.3, Sng 122.1-5 Based yes chɨn bɨlel okok, dum awl4.20 Dum anɨb ak, yɨb Gelisim agelɨgɨpal, Samaliya plopens nab okok yek. Samaliya binɨb mɨdupsek, kɨli dum anɨb ak apnan gɨl, kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgelɨgɨpal. kɨgom yɨmɨl God nop agnɨgelɨgɨpal agak. Pen nɨbi Juda kay, binɨb okok kɨli Jelusalem nep amɨl kɨgom yɨmɨl God nop agnɨgɨnɨgel apɨm agak.
